homepage.title: Home
homepage.description: Hello! My name is Esteban. I am an Argentine developer passionate about programming and is looking for challenges.
homepage.education-description: I am a Systems Analyst having studied at the Instituto Politecnico Superior 'Gral. San Martin'.
homepage.skills-description: I focus on technologies in the .NET environment. I want to specialize in that area and I want to do something practical and useful with the knowledge acquired.

1.title: Book Store
1.overview: Layered project using ASP.NET MVC Core, Entity Framework Core, SQL Server, LinQ, Stripe to make payments, and Validations.

2.title: Bootcamp Projects
2.overview: Angular CRUD with ASP.NET Framework / Web API (public API and API from scratch)

3.title: X Posts Clone
3.overview: Project with Next.js and Supabase. Supabase is used to store data, authenticate via Github, generate types and create access policies.

4.title: Hotel Reservation
4.overview: API from scratch using .NET, ASP.NET Core as front and SQL Server for the database.

5.title: Clothing Store
5.overview: Project with Angular CLI and Java with Spring
